name: Vault Robbery Experience
description:
You are part of a team performing the bank heist of a lifetime. It is your job to get inside the vault and take as much as possible.

A vertical slice of gameplay showcase initial design treatment created from scratch in 50 hours.

Constructive feedback welcome.

Controls

WASD: Move

Mouse: Aim

Mouse left button: Interact

Installation:

  • Download zip file
  • Extract files
  • Run .exe file

Platform: Windows
